channel.title: Teleport freezes game, then instant respawns
channel.description:
Set up multiple teleports in Multiplayer mode. When I go to teleport to a different station, it will freeze then when I try to click out of it, I respawn and have to go collect my inventory from the station I was trying to teleport to.
Maybe I have an incompatible mod creating issues?

item.title: Teleport freezes game, then instant respawns
item.dc:creator: @Robb Rob B
item.description:
@Robb wrote:

This seems to be an issue with base game - if multiplayer clients move fast enough, it will just kill them. The host seems to be immune to it. It can also happen with hypertube cannons and modded hypertubes.

Read full topic
item.source: Teleport freezes game, then instant respawns
